snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes Twitter challenging a basic part of the French language, how Kindle Serials could change the way some books are...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes Twitter challenging a basic part of the French language, how Kindle Serials could change the way some books are written and a famous author taking on Wikipedia.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot:  Twitter Challenges French, and Facebook-Related Spam
